markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Corrosive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2834)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=524" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 237 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Acid sizzles across the surface of the weapon etched with this rune. When you hit with the weapon, add 1d6 acid damage to the damage dealt. In addition, on a critical hit, the target's armor (if any) takes 3d6 acid damage (before applying Hardness); if the target has a shield raised, the shield takes this damage instead. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Corrosive
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 237 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 583 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Corrosive (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 237 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 583 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The acid damage dealt by this weapon ignores the target's acid resistance. Increase the acid damage dealt to armor or a shield on a critical hit to 6d6.
name: Corrosive
